overview: Here it is – the exciting Second issue of Grip Video! The boys at Grip bring you the best car show coverage, in-depth celebrity interviews, the hottest import girls and the craziest street racing action you’ll ever see in an import street racing video. Packed with technical features and the latest product reviews, Grip delivers to car fans around the world.
tagline: Covering the Import Auto Show and race scene, Grip delivers hard hitting action, technical features, and product showcases.
title: Grip Video Volume 2
